Indian Ocean bu otu oke osimiri e kere mgbe a kewasiri-akewa Osimiri uwa n'ise
O bu nke ato hiri nne, nke mbu na ano buru Pacific na Atlantic Ocean
Indian Ocean no na okpuru ala ndi India, bu n'ebe Asia
Na otu aka ya no ala Africa, na out aka ozo no ala Australia
O no n'elu Antarctica na Southern Ocean.
